title: Handle an Emergency Unmooring
description: A fire breaks out on a vessel at berth. The harbormaster orders an emergency unmooring to move the vessel away from the quay.

tasks.description: Receive the emergency order from the harbormaster to cast off the vessel immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The mooring gang supervisor receives the urgent command.

tasks.description: Use emergency release hooks or, if necessary, cut the mooring lines to free the vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The mooring lines are released as quickly as possible.

tasks.description: Confirm to the tugboats and pilot that the vessel is free so it can be towed away from the berth to a safe location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor confirms 'all lines gone' so the emergency towage can begin.
